87  template<typename T, typename ...Args>
88  inline void flushSetting(Args&&... args) {
89  // Create the setting, adding it to current settings
90  const T& setting = static_cast<const T&>(
91  m_renderSettings.addSetting<T>(std::forward<Args>(args)...));
92  //std::shared_ptr<RenderSetting> setting = std::make_shared<T> (std::forward<Args>(args)...);
93 
94  // Set the actual settings in OpenGL, without worrying about caching previous values
95  setting.set(*this);
96  }

103  const Uuid& boundBuffer(GL::BufferType type) const {
104  size_t idx = bufferTypeIndex(type);
105  return m_boundBuffers[idx];
106  }
107 
109  void setBoundBuffer(GL::BufferType type, const Uuid& uuid) {
110  size_t idx = bufferTypeIndex(type);
111  m_boundBuffers[idx] = uuid;
112  }
